titleStmt.title: His Majesties last message to the Parliament, with His desires for the Bishop of Armagh, Bishop of Exeter, Bishop of Rochester, Bishop of Worcester, and other doctors to come to Him. And His Majesites declaration concerning the Marquis of Ormonds negotiation in Ireland. Also the votes of both Houses of Parliament, in answer to His Majesties message. With a letter to the commissioners in the Isle of Wight which passed both Houses on Saturday last being the 4th of November 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: His Majesties last message to the Parliament, with His desires for the Bishop of Armagh, Bishop of Exeter, Bishop of Rochester, Bishop of Worcester, and other doctors to come to Him. And His Majesites declaration concerning the Marquis of Ormonds negotiation in Ireland. Also the votes of both Houses of Parliament, in answer to His Majesties message. With a letter to the commissioners in the Isle of Wight which passed both Houses on Saturday last being the 4th of November 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Smithurst, neer Pye-corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
